thread.title: BRIEF-Bombardier Comments On The Preferred Bidder Announcement For The Reseau Electrique Metropolitain Project

title: BRIEF-Bombardier Comments On The Preferred Bidder Announcement For The Reseau Electrique Metropolitain Project

organizations.name: reseau electrique metropolitain project reuters staff  feb

text:
February 8, 2018 / 4:26 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Bombardier Comments On The Preferred Bidder Announcement For The Reseau Electrique Metropolitain Project Reuters Staff 
Feb 8 (Reuters) - BOMBARDIER TRANSPORTATION : 
* BOMBARDIER COMMENTS ON THE PREFERRED BIDDER ANNOUNCEMENT FOR THE RESEAU ELECTRIQUE METROPOLITAIN PROJECT 
* BOMBARDIER TRANSPORTATION- CONFIRMS NOT BEEN SELECTED AS PREFERRED BIDDER FOR PROVISION OF RSSOM CONTRACT FOR REM PROJECT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
